medical_history.chief_complaint: Persistent headaches, generalized weakness, and a droopy left eyelid.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient has a 4-month history of recurrent headaches that are refractory to treatment. She endorsed a 20-pound weight loss during initial hospital assessment. Symptoms have progressed to include generalized weakness and cranial nerve palsies.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Past medical history significant for type II diabetes mellitus and hypertension (both well-controlled and off medications).
medical_history.social_history: The patient was independent and healthy before the onset of her headaches. She worked as a cardiovascular technician, was an avid gardener, and often remodeled her house. She has no history of atypical infections or immunocompromised status.
